text: Tomken is a bus rapid transit station on the Mississauga Transitway in central Mississauga, Ontario, Canada. It is located on the west side of Tomken Road along the north side of Eastgate Parkway. The first four stations on the Transitway at Central Parkway, Cawthra, Tomken and Dixie, opened on 17 November 2014. ==References== ==External links== Category:Mississauga Transitway
title: Tomken station
